name: Hyper Space (Everton Mazepa GameDev)
description:
Hyper Space is an “Avoid ’Em Up” arcade game with a retro futuristic look.

“Easy to learn, hard to master” to go further and reach the highest score you will need to pilot with mastery. Control your spaceship through a mysterious universe collecting stars and deftly dodging space objects like asteroids, satellites, black holes and more!

Collect points to unlock new skins, travel through space in style to the farthest galaxies.

• Controls: 
- Move: Arrow Keys or W, A, S, D.
- Confirm: Enter or Space.
- Cancel: Esc.

• Developed by: Everton Mazepa.
• 3D Artist: Lucas Matheus.
• Music: SubspaceAudio.
• Game Engine: Bakin.
